original_title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Enter Shredder
overview: Get lean, mean and green with the turtles team!  Join Leo, Donnie, Ralph and Mikey as they take on the streets of NYC, where every turn yields a new enemy. Get ready for non-stop battles against Kraang-droids, mechanical Mousers, a mutant alligator, and even the evil Shredder himself.  Episodes include:  “Monkey Brains”, “Never say Xever”, “Enter Shredder”, “Panic in the sewers”, “Mousers Attack!”, “It came from the depths”, “New girl in town”
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Enter Shredder
